q1.title: Is there a formal process in place for initiating business projects that can incorporate Generative AI?

q2.title: Are financial forecasts for projects applicable to Generative AI created and tracked using synthetic data for privacy?

q3.title: Is Generative AI utilized to enhance the efficiency of basic project management tasks?

q4.title: Are potential project risks assessed using predictive models powered by Generative AI?

q5.title: Is the assignment of ad-hoc tasks informed by recommendations from Generative AI systems?

q6.title: Is customer feedback on business services/products analyzed using Generative AI tools?

q7.title: Can insights from informal communication within the business currently be analyzed by Generative AI for actionable intelligence?

q8.title: Are urgent business tasks prioritized with the assistance of Generative AI decision-making tools?

q9.title: Do team members have a clear understanding of the objectives when using Generative AI in projects?

q10.title: Can AI tools currently be employed to manage and ensure the levels of quality of business projects?
